mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltOgnzPrcsPrfmncMapper.selectFcltOgnzPrcsPrfmnc */ FCLT.TRGT_YR AS TRGT_YR , FCLT.APC_CD AS APC_CD , FCLT.SN AS SN , FCLT.FCLT_OGNZ_CLSF_CD AS FCLT_OGNZ_CLSF_CD , FCLT.FCLT_OGNZ_TRMT_CD AS FCLT_OGNZ_TRMT_CD , FCLT.FCLT_OGNZ_TRMT_AMT AS FCLT_OGNZ_TRMT_AMT , FCLT.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , FCLT.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , FCLT.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , FCLT.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , FCLT.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , FCLT.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , FCLT.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_FCLT_OGNZ_PRCS_PRFMNC FCLT WHERE 1=1 AND TRGT_YR = #{trgtYr} AND APC_CD = #{apcCd}
